Question Number: 8A
Variable Label: Buy and sell goods

    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Employ other people

Question Number: 27
Variable Label: Influence others vs. do not influence them
Question Text: a. in discussions about politics with friends and neighbors, i can influence the opinions of others    b. discussion about politics with friends and neighbors influence them vs not influence
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 28
Variable Label: Government too complicated vs understand govt.
Question Text: a. the way the government operates sometimes seems so complicated that i cannot really understand           what is going on.    b. i can usually understand the way that government works

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 35
Variable Label: No expression of different views VS allow differences
Question Text: a. it is dangerous to allow the expression of too many different points of view.    b. if people have different views than i do, they should be allowed to express them

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 36
Variable Label: Everyone votes VS only educated vote
Question Text: a. all people should be permitted to vote, even if they do not fully understand all the issues in an election.    b. only those who are sufficiently well educated should be allowed to vote
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 37
Variable Label: President can change Constitution VS obey the Constitution
Question Text: a. the president of [country] should be able to change the constitution whenever he chooses.    b. in [country], even the president should obey the constitution
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 38
Variable Label: Violence for political goals VS Violence never justified
Question Text: a. in [country], it is sometimes alright for citizens to use violence in trying to reach political goals.    b. the use of violence is never justified in [country] politics
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 39
Variable Label: Family members agree on politics VS Differences in family okay
Question Text: a. all members of a family should hold the same political opinions.    b. every family member should be free to make up his or her own mind on political issues
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 40
Variable Label: Equal rights for women VS Women subject to traditional African laws
Question Text: a. women in [country] should have equal rights and receive the same treatment as men do.    b. women have always been subject to traditional african law, and should remain so
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 41A
Variable Label: Rate present system of government with elections and many parties
Question Text: we are now going to discuss how much you like different kinds of government i would like you to give marks out of ten. let us say that the best government gets 10 out of 10 and the worst government gets 1 out of 10. what mark would you give to:  our present system of government with free elections and many parties
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Rate the former colonial system

    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 43A
Variable Label: Get rid of elections so strong leader can decide everything
Question Text: some people say that we would be better off if the country was governed differently. what do you think about the following options? a. we should get rid of elections so that a strong leader can decide everything
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 43D
Variable Label: The most important decisions should be left to experts
Question Text: some people say that we would be better off if the country was governed differently. what do you think about the following options?  d. the most important decisions, for example on the economy, should be left to experts
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 54

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 55
Variable Label: People responsible for selves VS Government responsible
Question Text: a. people should look after themselves and be responsible for their own success in life    b. the government should bear the main responsibility for ensuring the well-being of people
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 56
Variable Label: People create their own jobs VS Government provide jobs for all
Question Text: a. the best way to create jobs is to encourage people to start their own businesses    b. the government should provide employment for everyone who wants to work
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 57
Variable Label: Free to earn VS Government limits rich earnings
Question Text: a. everyone should be free to earn as much as they can, even if this leads to differences in income between people    b. the government should place limits on how much the rich can earn, even is this discourages some people from working hard
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 58
Variable Label: Community should own land VS Individuals own land
Question Text: a. in rural areas, land should be owned by the community and allocated by the traditional rulers    b. people should be able to own their own land, including buying and selling it, even in rural areas
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 65
Variable Label: Encourage foreign investment VS Be wary of foreign investors

    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 90
Variable Label: You group economic conditions compared to others
